item.title: Problem with Dragon Claws?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

Hey, i added the special attack to dragon claws and I currently have two problems, only two problems. My first problem is that when i attack with the dragon claws, it only hits two times. My second problem is that you can only attack npc’s, when i try to do the special on a player, it just does a regular attack. Here is my code…

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 600, 2068); npcDamage(8); }

btw…what does npcDamage(#) mean?

Read full topic
